pages.title: Page List
pages.description: List of additional config files to load as extra pages

path.title: Path
path.description: The file name, or path. If in public directory, use just `file-name.yml`

title.title: Title
title.description: Title and heading for the app

navLinks.title: Navigation Links
navLinks.description: Quick access links, displayed in header

target.title: Opening Method
target.description: Where / how the item is opened when it's clicked

footerText.title: Footer Text
footerText.description: Content to display within the global page footer

logo.title: App Logo
logo.description: Path to an optional image asset, to be displayed in the header

startingView.title: Starting View
startingView.description: Which page to load by default, and on the base page or domain root. You can still switch to different views from within the UI

defaultOpeningMethod.title: Default Opening Method
defaultOpeningMethod.description: The default opening method for items. Only used if no item.target is specified

statusCheck.title: Enable Status Checks
statusCheck.description: Displays an online/ offline status for each of your services

statusCheckInterval.title: Status Check Interval
statusCheckInterval.description: How often to recheck statuses. If set to 0, status will only be checked on page load

language.title: Language
language.description: The ISO code of your desired language, must have translations present, check docs for more info

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: A theme to be applied by default on first load

backgroundImg.title: Background Image
backgroundImg.description: A URL to an image asset to be displayed as background

faviconApi.title: Favicon API
faviconApi.description: Which service to use to resolve favicons. Set to local to do this locally instead

layout.title: Default Layout
layout.description: Specifies sections layout orientation on the home screen

iconSize.title: Default Icon Size
iconSize.description: The size of each link item / icon

colCount.title: Column Count
colCount.description: Number of section columns for homepage. Leave blank for column count to be responsively calculated based on screen size

routingMode.title: Routing Mode
routingMode.description: The Vue routing mode to use, history mode will remove the annoying hash from the URL, but requires some extra config on some systems

workspaceLandingUrl.title: Workspace Landing URL
workspaceLandingUrl.description: The URL of an app, service or website to render when the Workspace view is opened

enableMultiTasking.title: Enable Multi-Tasking
enableMultiTasking.description: If set to true, will keep apps opened in the workspace open in the background. Useful for switching between sites, but comes at the cost of performance

widgetsAlwaysUseProxy.title: Widgets always use proxy
widgetsAlwaysUseProxy.description: If set to true, the useProxy option for widgets will always be applied without having to specify it for each widget

disableWebSearch.title: Disable Web Search?
disableWebSearch.description: If set to true, web search will be disabled all together

searchEngine.title: Search Engine
searchEngine.description: Set your default search engine. Reference provider by key, see docs for all supported search engines, or set to custom to use your own

customSearchEngine.title: Custom Search Engine
customSearchEngine.description: Set the URL of a self-hosted or custom search engine, including GET query params. You must also set searchEngine: custom

openingMethod.title: Search Opening Method
openingMethod.description: Set where you would like search results to open to

searchBangs.title: Search Bangs
searchBangs.description: A KV-pair of custom search bangs. The key should be the shortcut to type, and the value is the search engine, specified either by key or full URL

enableFontAwesome.title: Enable Font-Awesome?
enableFontAwesome.description: If true, font-awesome will be loaded, if false they will not be. If left empty, icons will only be loaded if needed

enableMaterialDesignIcons.title: Enable Material Design Icons?
enableMaterialDesignIcons.description: If true, material-design-icons will be loaded, if false they will not be. If left empty, icons will only be loaded if needed

cssThemes.title: Additional CSS Themes
cssThemes.description: Theme names to be added to the dropdown, once added you can then add custom CSS to style your theme

customColors.title: Custom Colors
customColors.description: Set a custom color palette for any theme, see docs for more info

externalStyleSheet.title: External Stylesheets
externalStyleSheet.description: List of URLs of external stylesheets to add to dropdown/ load

customCss.title: Custom CSS
customCss.description: Any custom CSS overides to be applied globally, should be minified

hideComponents.title: Hidden Components
hideComponents.description: Hide individual parts of the page. If not set, all components are visible by default

hideHeading.title: Hide Heading?
hideHeading.description: If set to true, the page heading & subtitle will be hidden

hideNav.title: Hide Nav Bar?
hideNav.description: If set to true, the navigation menu will be hidden

hideSearch.title: Hide Search Bar?
hideSearch.description: If set to true, the search bar will be hidden

hideSettings.title: Hide Settings?
hideSettings.description: If set to true, the settings buttons will be hidden

hideFooter.title: Hide Footer?
hideFooter.description: If set to true, the page footer will be hidden

enableGuestAccess.title: Enable Guest Mode?
enableGuestAccess.description: If set to true, an unauthenticated user will be able to have read-only access to dashboard, without needing to login. Requires auth to be configured.

users.title: Users
users.description: Usernames and hashed credentials for frontend authentication

hash.title: Hashed Pass
hash.description: A SHA-256 hashed password for that user

type.title: Privileges
type.description: User type, denoting privilege level, either admin or normal

enableKeycloak.title: Enable Keycloak?
enableKeycloak.description: If set to true, and auth.keycloak is also configured, then Keycloak will be used for app auth

serverUrl.title: Server URL
serverUrl.description: The URL (or URL/ IP + Port) where your keycloak server is running

realm.title: Realm
realm.description: The name of the realm (must already be created) that you want to use

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: The Client ID of the client you created for use with Dashy

legacySupport.title: Legacy Support
legacySupport.description: If using Keycloak 17 or older, then set this to true

showSplashScreen.title: Show splash screen
showSplashScreen.description: If set to true, a loading screen will be shown

preventWriteToDisk.title: Prevent saving config to disk
preventWriteToDisk.description: If set to true, no users will not be able to save config changes to disk through the UI

preventLocalSave.title: Prevent saving config to local storage
preventLocalSave.description: If set to true, no users will not be able to save config changes to the browser's local storage

disableConfiguration.title: Disable all UI Config
disableConfiguration.description: If set to true, no users will be able to view or edit the config through the UI

allowConfigEdit.title: Allow Config Editing
allowConfigEdit.description: Can user write changes to conf.yml file from the UI. If set to false, preferences are only stored locally

enableServiceWorker.title: Enable Service Worker
enableServiceWorker.description: If set to true, then service workers will be used to cache page contents

disableContextMenu.title: Disable Context Menus
disableContextMenu.description: If set to true, custom right-click context menu will be disabled

disableUpdateChecks.title: Disable Update Checks
disableUpdateChecks.description: Prevents Dashy from checking for updates

disableSmartSort.title: Disable Smart-Sort
disableSmartSort.description: Prevents the app storing local click count, required for the last-used and most-used sort orders

enableErrorReporting.title: Enable Error Reporting
enableErrorReporting.description: Enable anonymous crash reports. This helps bugs be found and fixed, in order to make Dashy more stable. Reporting is off by default, and no data will EVER be collected without your explicit and active concent.

sentryDsn.title: Custom Sentry DSN
sentryDsn.description: The DSN to your self-hosted Sentry server, if you need to collect bug reports. Only used if enableErrorReporting is enabled

icon.title: Section Icon
icon.description: Icon will be displayed next to title

displayData.title: Display Data
displayData.description: Optional meta data for customizing a section

sortBy.title: Sort By
sortBy.description: How to sort items within the section. By default items are displayed in the order in which they are listed in within the config

collapsed.title: Is Collapsed?
collapsed.description: If true, section needs to be clicked to open

cutToHeight.title: Cut to Height
cutToHeight.description: By default, sections will fill available space. Set this option to true to match section height with content height

color.title: Color
color.description: Hex code, or HTML color for section fill

itemSize.title: Item Size
itemSize.description: Size of items within the section

rows.title: Num Rows
rows.description: The amount of space that the section spans vertically

cols.title: Num Cols
cols.description: The amount of space that the section spans horizontally

sectionLayout.title: Layout Type
sectionLayout.description: If set to grid, items have uniform width, and itemCount can be set

hideForUsers.title: Hide for Users
hideForUsers.description: Section will be visible to all users, except for those specified in this list

items.description: Username for the user that will not be able to view this section

showForUsers.title: Show for Users
showForUsers.description: Section will be hidden from all users, except for those specified in this list

items.description: Username for the user that will have access to this section

hideForGuests.title: Hide for Guests?
hideForGuests.description: If set to true, section will be visible for logged in users, but not for guests

showForKeycloakUsers.title: Show for select Keycloak groups or roles
showForKeycloakUsers.description: Configure the Keycloak groups or roles that will have access to this section

groups.title: Show for Groups
groups.description: Section will be hidden from all users except those with one or more of these groups

items.description: Name of the group that will be able to view this section

roles.title: Show for Roles
roles.description: Section will be hidden from all users except those with one or more of these roles

items.description: Name of the role that will be able to view this section

hideForKeycloakUsers.title: Hide for select Keycloak groups or roles
hideForKeycloakUsers.description: Configure the Keycloak groups or roles that will not have access to this section

groups.title: Hide for Groups
groups.description: Section will be hidden from users with any of these groups

items.description: name of the group that will not be able to view this section

roles.title: Hide for Roles
roles.description: Section will be hidden from users with any of roles

items.description: name of the role that will not be able to view this section

items.title: Items
items.description: Array of items to display with a section

description.title: Description
description.description: Short description, shown on hover or in a tooltip

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: An icon, either as a font-awesome, simple-icon or mdi identifier, emoji, favicon, generative or the URL/ path to a local or remote icon asset

url.title: Service URL
url.description: The destination to navigate to when item is clicked, expressed as a valid URL, IP or hostname

displayData.title: Display Data
displayData.description: Optional meta data for customizing an item

hideForUsers.title: Hide for Users
hideForUsers.description: Item will be visible to all users, except for those specified in this list

items.description: Username for the user that will not be able to view this item

showForUsers.title: Show for Users
showForUsers.description: Item will be hidden from all users, except for those specified in this list

items.description: Username for the user that will have access to this item

hideForGuests.title: Hide for Guests?
hideForGuests.description: If set to true, item will be visible for logged in users, but not for guests

showForKeycloakUsers.title: Show for select Keycloak groups or roles
showForKeycloakUsers.description: Configure the Keycloak groups or roles that will have access to this item

groups.title: Show for Groups
groups.description: Item will be hidden from all users except those with one or more of these groups

items.description: Name of the group that will be able to view this item

roles.title: Show for Roles
roles.description: Item will be hidden from all users except those with one or more of these roles

items.description: Name of the role that will be able to view this item

hideForKeycloakUsers.title: Hide for select Keycloak groups or roles
hideForKeycloakUsers.description: Configure the Keycloak groups or roles that will not have access to this item

groups.title: Hide for Groups
groups.description: Item will be hidden from users with any of these groups

items.description: name of the group that will not be able to view this item

roles.title: Hide for Roles
roles.description: Item will be hidden from users with any of roles

items.description: name of the role that will not be able to view this item

target.title: Opening Method
target.description: Where / how the item is opened when it's clicked

hotkey.title: Hot Key
hotkey.description: A numeric shortcut key, between 0 and 9. Useful for quickly launching frequently used applications

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A list of tags for improved search. Separate using a comma

provider.title: Provider
provider.description: Provider name, e.g. Microsoft, Nebucasa, DigitalOcean, etc

statusCheck.title: Enable Status Check
statusCheck.description: Whether or not to display online/ offline status for this service. Will override appConfig.statusCheck

statusCheckUrl.title: Status Check URL
statusCheckUrl.description: Custom status check endpoint for this item. Useful if the default URL doesn't return 200, or if your service has a dedicated status check endpoint

statusCheckHeaders.title: Status Check Headers
statusCheckHeaders.description: Custom headers for status checking, useful if your service requires authorization headers to return a 200

statusCheckAllowInsecure.title: Status Check Disable SSL
statusCheckAllowInsecure.description: Allows for running status checks on insecure content/ non-HTTPS apps. Prevents checks failing for non-SSL sites

statusCheckAcceptCodes.title: Status Check - Accepted HTTP Codes
statusCheckAcceptCodes.description: If your service's response code is anything other than 2xx, then you can opt to specify an alternative success code

statusCheckMaxRedirects.title: Status Check - Max Redirects
statusCheckMaxRedirects.description: If your service redirects to another page, and you would like status checks to follow redirects, then specify the maximum number of redirects here

color.title: Custom Color
color.description: A custom fill color of the item, expressed either as hex code or color name

id.title: Item ID
id.description: Unique ID for each item. Generated automatically, shouldn't need to be set manually.

type.title: Widget Type
type.description: The type of widget to use, see docs for supported options

updateInterval.title: Update Interval
updateInterval.description: Specified in seconds. If set, widget data will be re-retched at this interval to display up-to-date data

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Specified in milliseconds. If set, request will timeout after the specified interval. Defaults to 500/ half a sec

useProxy.title: Use Proxy?
useProxy.description: If set to true, request will be proxied through the backend. Requires the Node server to be running

options.title: Widget Options
options.description: Configuration options for widget. Varies depending on widget type, see docs for all options
